description: T.1 Lime - 1.5m Lateral reduction to suitable growth points on North & Western aspects shaping into remaining crown sympathetically.G.1 Maple x3 - 2.5m Reduction in height & 1m lateral reduction including 50cm clearance from adjacent buildings with all cuts made to suitable growth points and shaping into remaining crown sympathetically.
